## R/Shiny for Finance Education

R/Shiny allows finance educators to:

-  bring standard text graphs off the page and make them interactive.

-  incorporate massive amount of financial data generated each day.

-  leverage javascript libraries for innovative visualizations.

-  deliver content widely at inexpensive rates.
